description:
Includes all the necessary components to replace worn or damaged DragonFly™ stove and pump parts. Durable carrying case included. Includes parts for both old and new-style MSR® DragonFly fuel pumps. Includes:

  • Control valve o-rings (2)
  • Fuel tube o-rings for pump (2)
  • Fuel bottle o-rings (2)
  • Safety pin (for o-ring removal) (1)
  • Jet and cable tool (1)
  • Pump cup oil (1)
  • Check valve ball (1)
  • Check valve plug (1)
  • Check valve spring (1)
  • Air tube (1)
  • Dip tube (1)
  • Dip tube filter (1)
  • Flame spreader (1)
  • Fuel tube bushing for pump (1)
  • Shaker needle with cover (1)
  • Pump cup (1)
  • G jet (1)
  • K jet (1)
  • Fuel line filters (2)
  • Jet cleaning wire (1)
name: MSR DragonFly Expedition Service Kit
